text: Viktor Vladimirovich Ponedelnik (, 22 May 1937 in Rostov-on-DonПонедельник: благодаря подвыпившему писарю я мог бы стать Понедилком – 5 December 2020) was a Russian footballer and manager. He played for the Soviet Union national team. ==References== ==Other websites== *Biography from the official website of the Russian national team *Unofficial biography Category:1937 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Soviet footballers Category:Russian footballers
title: Viktor Ponedelnik
